Text: fiam mirrorsDear Sara It was wonderful to talk with you the other day I was looking for an excellent image of the Fiam mirrors and the best that I could find were on the Fiam website as it is in macromedia flash I am unable to copy and attach Hence I am listing their web address once on their site chose english version and then products there are many different mirrors available and my personal favorite is Caadre in natural with light Prices range from to wintegrated lamp This is for the free standing floor version that measures x w wwwfiamitaliait Let me know what you think All best wishes David
